front.title: A User Agent Profile Data Set for Media Policy

abstract.t: This specification defines a document format for the media properties of Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) sessions such as codecs or media types used. This format is based on XML and extends the Schema for SIP User Agent Profile Data Sets. It can be used to describe the media properties of a specific SIP session and to express media- related policies that can be applied to different SIP sessions.
